title: Sant Julia de Loria
extract:
Sant Julia de Loria (correctly Sant Julià de Lòria) [1]  lies on border to Spain in the southern parish (administrative division) in Andorra between Andorra La Vella and Spain.


Get in
Sant Julia de Loria lies some 7.5 km to the south of Andorra La Vella on the main road CG1 which runs down the Gran Valira (Grand Valley) towards La Seu d'Urgell/Seo de Urgel in Spain.
1 Intercity bus stop Sant Julia de Loria
Serving intercity buses are e.g. Flixbus, Andbus and DirectBus.


Get around


See
1 Sanctuary of Canòlic (Santuari de la Mare de Déu de Canòlich), ☏ +376 844 345. It is at 1,650 m. Dated from 13th century – Romanesque style. Every year, on the last Saturday in May happens a pilgrimage with the attendance of most of the people of Sant Julià de Lòria and many from elsewhere in the country. It is obligatory to reserve beforehand. 
2 Sant Serni de Nagol, ☏ +376 844 141. From July to August: every day 10:00-13:00 and 15:00-18:00. The rest of the year only at mass hours.. Church dated from 11th century – Romanesque style. It is outside of Nagol village. It is obligatory to reserve beforehand. Free-guided tours. 
3 Museu Fàbrica Reig, Carrer Doctor Palau 17, ☏ +376 741 545, infomuseu@reig.ad. Tu-Sa 10:00-20:00; Su 10:00-14:30. A museum of tobacco, smoking and smuggling housed in a former tobacco factory. €7. (updated Apr 2022)


Do


Buy


Eat
1 Bar Restaurant la Caulla, Av. Francesc Cairat, 26, ☏ +376 844 144. Bar and grill. (updated Apr 2022)
